title: Goldman’s India Push Bears Fruit in Crowded Wall Street Field
description: It was at a rare global board meeting in New Delhi’s Taj Mahal Hotel that Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s India country head made the case for change.
content: It was at a rare global board meeting in New Delhi’s Taj Mahal Hotel that Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s India country head made the case for change.
